title: #76 The Universe ft. Nic Novicki
itunes:title: #76 The Universe ft. Nic Novicki
description:
On this week's episode, Nic Novicki returns to share some legendary stories of driving, cooking, and an awkward first date. Plus, we discuss parallel universes, glitches in the matrix, and time travel as we take a look at the universe.

 

Podcast produced by Nate & Laura Bargatze

Recording & Editing by Genovations Media

https://www.natebargatze.com

https://www.allthingscomedy.com

https://www.genovationsmedia.com

Email - Nateland@NateBargatze.com

#nateland #natebargatze

  • Just visit TalkSpace.Com and get $100 off your first month when you use promo code NATE at sign-up.
